projectSummary: Prototyped AI-powered interactive experiences for Coca-Cola, including an AI-enabled vending machine concept that analyzed hydration signals and recommended products.

problem.summary: Coca-Cola was exploring how emerging AI capabilities could create more personalized, engaging brand experiences for retail and experiential environments.

goals: Translate creative concepts into working demos
Experiment with multimodal AI inputs and outputs
Showcase feasibility for future retail experiences
responsibilities: Building front-end interfaces for concept demos
Collaborating with designers and art directors on experiential flows
Rapid iteration across creative and technical concepts
Integrating AI classification and recommendation logic into UI demos
skillsUsed: Collaborative ideation with design and creative leadership
outcomes: Delivered working prototypes for AI-enabled retail interactions
Helped validate feasibility of the AI vending concept
Enabled creative and leadership teams to visualize future brand experiences
